--- DateTime: 2022/1/6 20:52
---@class SkillData
local SkillData = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function SkillData:initialize(type,con)
    self:initParams(type,con)
end

function SkillData:initParams(type,con)
    -- 大招 还是 普攻 还是 普通技能
    self._skillType = type
    -- 攻击距离
    self._skill_r = con
    -- 上次释放时间
    self._skill_time_play = 0
    -- 技能cd
    self._skill_time_cd = 0
    -- 是否被动
    self._isPassive = con.type == Enum_Battle.SkillType.Skill_passive



end

return SkillData
